snippet: The Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine, doubling as an arts space, is home to exhibitions like “Phoenix,” winged beasts from the artist Xu Bing.
lead_paragraph: The Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine, doubling as an arts space, is home to exhibitions like “Phoenix,” winged beasts from the artist Xu Bing.
